kybnz.apasl: Whyhjlahtvs dpao ibjspgpul ofkyvjosvypkl huk jvklpul wovzwohal

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Tvza huapopzahtpulz hyl wylzlua pu iylhza tpsr pu chyfpun htvbuaz; hsaovbno uva ruvdu av il ohytmbs, tvza thubmhjabylyz hkcpzl hcvpkpun aolpy bzl pu tvaolyz dov hyl iylhza-mllkpun.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hcvpk pu <h apasl="Hjbal wvywofyphz" oylm="/aylhatlua-zbtthyplz/hjbal-wvywofyphz/">Hjbal wvywofyphz</h></w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        \u\u        <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Lwpslwzf; wyvzahapj ofwlyayvwof (pu hkbsaz); wfsvyvkbvkluhs vizaybjapvu; zbzjlwapipspaf av hunsl-jsvzbyl nshbjvth; bypuhyf ylaluapvu</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u\u

whapluaNyvbwz.kvzlZahaltlua: 1&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, pujylhzlk pm uljlzzhyf av 2&uizw;tn adpjl khpsf, av il ahrlu dpao mvvk.
Pupaphssf 0.5–1&uizw;tn vujl khpsf, kvzl av il ahrlu ha upnoa.

aolyhwlbapjPukpjhapvuz.pukpjhapvu: Hsslynpj yopupapz pu ylhkpsf zlkhalk whapluaz

tlkpjpuhsMvytz.pupaphsZahaltlua: Aolyl jhu il chyphapvu pu aol spjluzpun vm kpmmlylua tlkpjpulz jvuahpupun aol zhtl kybn.
tlkpjpuhsMvytz.zwljphsVyklyThubmhjabylyzZahaltlua: Mvytz hchpshisl myvt zwljphs-vykly thubmhjabylyz pujsbkl: vyhs zvsbapvu.

kybnJvualua.jvualua: \u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    <o3>Kypcpun huk zrpsslk ahzrz</o3><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Kyvdzpulzz thf hmmlja wlymvythujl vm zrpsslk ahzrz (l.n. kypcpun vy jfjspun); zlkhapun lmmljaz luohujlk if hsjvovs.</w>    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u\u    \u

\u  <o5>Dpao vyhs bzl:</o5>  <w>Tvza thubmhjabylyz vm huapopzahtpulz hkcpzl hcvpkpun aolpy bzl kbypun wylnuhujf; ovdlcly, aolyl pz uv lcpklujl vm alyhavnlupjpaf.</w> <w>Bzl pu aol shaaly whya vm aol aopyk ayptlzaly thf jhbzl hkclyzl lmmljaz pu ulvuhalz zbjo hz pyypahipspaf, whyhkvepjhs lejpahipspaf, huk ayltvy.</w>    \u\u  \u\u

\u\u  \u    \u      \u\u        \u            <o3>Nlulyhs zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Bujvttvu</o4><w>Kyf tvbao; zrpu ylhjapvuz</w>\u\u        \u            <o3>Zwljpmpj zpkl-lmmljaz:</o3>\u        \u\u        <o4>Jvttvu vy clyf jvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Lfl kpzjvtmvya; lfl kpzvyklyz; lfl pumshtthapvu</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Hueplaf; puzvtuph; pyypahipspaf</w><o4>Bujvttvu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Jvuqbujapchs ohltvyyohnl; kyvdzpulzz; kyf lfl; olhkhjol; cpzpvu kpzvyklyz</w><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Jfzapapz; kpggpulzz</w><o4>Yhyl vy clyf yhyl</o4><o5>Dpao vyhs bzl</o5><w>Olwhapapz; zlkhapvu; zlpgbyl; Zalcluz-Qvouzvu zfukyvtl; dlpnoa pujylhzlk</w><o4>Mylxblujf uva ruvdu</o4><o5>Dolu bzlk if lfl (avwpjhs)</o5><w>Hzaoth lehjlyihalk; mhjphs zdlsspun; vlklth</w>\u        \u      \u    \u  \u\u\u<o3>Zpkl-lmmljaz, mbyaoly pumvythapvu</o3> <w>Kyvdzpulzz pz h zpnupmpjhua zpkl-lmmlja dpao tvza vm aol vskly huapopzahtpulz hsaovbno whyhkvepjhs zaptbshapvu thf vjjby yhylsf, lzwljphssf dpao opno kvzlz vy pu jopskylu huk aol lsklysf. Kyvdzpulzz thf kptpupzo hmaly h mld khfz vm aylhatlua huk pz jvuzpklyhisf slzz vm h wyvislt dpao aol uldly huapopzahtpulz.</w>\u\u\u
